title: Virtual Reality Content Development Workshop for 21st-Century Core Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and general comprehension of scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: A course for current practitioners to acquire the competency of creating virtual reality-based content for practical problem-solving in scientific fields.

learning_goals: Learners can create 3D content explaining scientific principles using virtual reality production tools
Learners can derive creative problem-solving solutions and improve project outcomes through peer collaboration
Learners can reflectively evaluate their own creative processes and diagnose 21st-century competency development levels
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
